caption.p: Tumor cell nuclei detection. (a) One ROI with the reference standard; black and yellow squares respectively mark all and positive tumor cells. (b) Mark-up image resulting from non-machine learning based image analysis with ImageScope; blue and red markings respectively highlight detected Ki67 negative and positive tumor cells. (c) Mark-up image resulting from machine learning based image analysis with Aiforia; highlighted red area is the detected tumor region, red and green circles respectively show detected Ki67 negative and positive tumor cells.
